mission: Define the authoritative contract for Context Packets.
current_reality: Stage 0 focuses on establishing contracts and artifacts, not tools.
Context Packet sections must be consistent between human- and machine-readable forms.
constraints: Do not implement runtime tools or services in this substage.
Keep the schema and template synchronized.
acceptance: Template and schema share field names and section order.
A valid manifest example is committed alongside the contract artifacts.
failure_modes: Schema or template drift causing ambiguous packets.
Including execution logic or tools during Stage 0.2.
substage_gate: In-scope: defining static contract artifacts for Context Packets.
Out-of-scope: composing packets automatically or running linters.
notes: Optional fields like project, stage, substage, version, and sources_of_truth may be omitted when not applicable.
